sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import BookSearch from './BookSearch'; const Dashboard = () => { const { user, logout } = useAuth(); const [currentTime, setCurrentTime] = useState(new Date()); useEffect(() => { const timer = setInterval(() => { setCurrentTime(new Date()); }, 1000); return () => clearInterval(timer); }, []); const handleLogout = () => { logout(); }; const formatDate = (date) => { return new Intl.DateTimeFormat('en-US', { weekday: 'long', year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric', hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit', second: '2-digit' }).format(date); }; return (
{/* Floating background shapes */}
{/* Header */}
{user?.username?.charAt(0).toUpperCase()}

Welcome, {user?.username}!

You're successfully authenticated

{/* Book Search Section */}
{/* Main Content */}
{/* User Info Card */}

Profile Information

{user?.username}

{user?.email}

{user?.id}

{/* Current Time Card */}

Current Time

{currentTime.toLocaleTimeString()}

{formatDate(currentTime)}

{/* Session Status Card */}

Session Status

Active Session
JWT Authenticated
MongoDB Connected
); }; export default Dashboard;
